name: R5-Medication-R4-Medication
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 Medication into FHIR R4

target.comment: R5 `Medication` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Medication`
R5 `Medication.batch` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Medication.batch`
R5 `Medication.batch.expirationDate` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Medication.batch.expirationDate`

R5 `Medication.batch.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Medication.batch.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`
R5 `Medication.batch.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Medication.batch.id`
R5 `Medication.batch.lotNumber` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Medication.batch.lotNumber`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R5 `Medication.batch.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Medication.batch.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`
R5 `Medication.code` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Medication.code`
R5 `Medication.contained` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Medication.contained`
R5 `Medication.doseForm` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Medication.form`

R5 `Medication.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Medication.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`
R5 `Medication.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Medication.id`
R5 `Medication.identifier` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Medication.identifier`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R5 `Medication.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Medication.implicitRules`
R5 `Medication.ingredient` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Medication.ingredient`

R5 `Medication.ingredient.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Medication.ingredient.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`
R5 `Medication.ingredient.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Medication.ingredient.id`
R5 `Medication.ingredient.isActive` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Medication.ingredient.isActive`

R5 `Medication.ingredient.item` maps as RelatedTo to R4 `Medication.ingredient.item[x]` - item[x] removed a binding requirement - Example http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/medication-codes; item[x] has change due to type change: R5 item CodeableReference has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 item[x]

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R5 `Medication.ingredient.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Medication.ingredient.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`

R5 `Medication.ingredient.strength[x]` maps as RelatedTo to R4 `Medication.ingredient.strength` - strength removed a binding requirement - Preferred http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/medication-ingredientstrength; strength has change due to type change: R5 `strength[x]` `Ratio` maps as RelatedTo for R4 `strength`; strength has change due to type change: R5 strength[x] CodeableConcept has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 strength; strength has change due to type change: R5 strength[x] Quantity has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 strength

R5 `Medication.language` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R4 `Medication.language` - language changed the binding strength from Required to Preferred; language has change due to type change: R5 `language` `code` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R4 `language`
R5 `Medication.marketingAuthorizationHolder` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Medication.manufacturer`
R5 `Medication.meta` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Medication.meta`

R5 `Medication.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Medication.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`

R5 `Medication.status` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Medication.status` - status has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/medication-status|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/medication-status|4.0.1 (Equivalent)

element.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R5 `Medication.text` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Medication.text`
R5 `Medication.totalVolume` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Medication.amount` - amount has change due to type change: R5 totalVolume Quantity has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 amount
